function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of green space in urban areas","Impact":"Decreased physical and mental health, decreased quality of life","Mitigation":"Creating more green space in urban areas, prioritizing green space in urban planning","Technologies":"Green infrastructure, landscaping, urban design interventions","People":"Urban residents, city dwellers","Owner":"Urban planners, designers, local governments"},{"Description":"Limited access to nature and outdoor spaces","Impact":"Reduced opportunities for physical activity, increased stress and mental health issues","Mitigation":"Creating community gardens, promoting the development of parks and trails, increasing accessibility to nature","Technologies":"Community gardening tools, green infrastructure, urban planning and design","People":"Urban residents, community members","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations, urban planners"},{"Description":"Unhealthy urban lifestyles","Impact":"Poor physical health, unhealthy eating habits, sedentary lifestyle","Mitigation":"Promoting community gardens, incorporating green space into existing communities, prioritizing healthy urban planning","Technologies":"Urban gardening tools, green infrastructure, urban design interventions","People":"Urban residents, city dwellers","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, community organizations"}]}
